QuestData.Title: Cured Ham
QuestData.Description:
That foul thing has to be what's keeping my men transformed into pigs.
Hmm. Well there isn't too much that can withstand a good cleansing fire! I say we burn it!
Toss it into the campfire!
QuestData.LogDescription: Toss the Pig Fetish into the campfire.
QuestData.CompletionText: Into the flames with that foul thing!
QuestData.RewardText: You did it! The spell is broken and my men are back to normal!$B$BWell... mostly. They're alive at least.$B$BNow we can get back to normal around here. If you see Elijah in Fallhaven, tell him he'll get his sausages soon.
